trends: There have been no other sightings in Lake Lure
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailswas sitting on rear deck of house speaking with daughter when i noticed first two,then two more orange sphere shaped objects moving due north ,approx 1 mile away and perhaps 700-1000 ft. in altitude, we watched them for approx. two minutes then they all vanished.Was a little perplexed as to what they were as there was no sound nor identification lights as one would see from an aircraft.
Summary: observerd 4 orange globes traveling due north,approx 700 ft. heighth,slight variance in direction and alltitude from all till they all abruptly vanished
